box.collections¶

Library adds some new types to standard collections module.

class box.collections.ManagedDict¶

Bases: builtins.dict

Dict with all mutations through __setitem__ and __delitem__.

Type reimplements all standard dict mutation methods to guarantee that all of changes will be processed through __setitem__ and __delitem__. This feature gives full control over dict changes by client.

clear()¶
pop(key, default=None)¶
popitem()¶
setdefault(key, default=None)¶
update(other=None, **kwargs)¶
